body_html:
As @mmpinso noted, SpatialMaxPoolWithArgMaxHelper in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/maxpooling_op.cc actually does the max pool and argmax calculations on the CPU.

Currently, it's only used for the gradient calculation. I'm working on also calling it from MaxPoolingWithArgmaxOp::Compute for the CPU.

https://github.com/nio1814/tensorflow/tree/maxpoolwithargmax-cpu

body:
As @mmpinso noted, SpatialMaxPoolWithArgMaxHelper in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/maxpooling_op.cc actually does the max pool and argmax calculations on the CPU.

Currently, it's only used for the gradient calculation. I'm working on also calling it from MaxPoolingWithArgmaxOp::Compute for the CPU.

https://github.com/nio1814/tensorflow/tree/maxpoolwithargmax-cpu
